Product Name: ZITHROMAX ORAL SUSPENSION 200 mg / 5 mL (15 mL)
Dosage (Adult): Treatment of sexually transmitted disease1000 mg in one single oral doseProphylaxis against MAC infections in HIV patients1200 mg once per weekTreatment of DMAC infections in HIV patietns600 mg once a day, in combination with other antimycobacterial agentsFor all other indications the dosage is 1500 mg, to be administered as 500 mg per day for three days. Alternatively the same total dosage (1500 mg) can also be given over a period of 5 days with 500 mg on the first day and then 250 mg on days 2 to 5.
Dosage (Children): Max recommended total dose for any treatment is 1500 mg. In general, the total dose in children is 30 mg/kg. The total dose of 30mg/kg should be given as a single day dose of 10mg/kg daily for 3 days, or given over 5 days with a single daily dose of 10mg/kg on day 1, then 5mg/kg on days 2-5.Acute otitis mediaAs an alternative to the above dosing, a single dose of 30mg/kg can also be given.Padiatric streptococcal pharyngitisSingle dose of 10 mg/kg or 20 mg/kg for 3 days with a maximum daily dosage of 500 mg.
